Package com.enjin.sdk.graphql

Class GraphQLRequest<T extends GraphQLRequest<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.enjin.sdk.graphql.GraphQLRequest<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphQLVariableHolder<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthApp, AuthPlayer, BaseRequest, CreateApp, CreateIdentity, CreateUser, DeleteApp, DeleteIdentity, GetPlatform, GetWallet, InvalidateTokenMetadata, OAuthUser, PaginationRequest, UnlinkApp, UnlinkIdentity, UpdateApp, UpdateIdentity
public class GraphQLRequest<T extends GraphQLRequest<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphQLVariableHolder<T>
Represents a model of a GraphQL request and facilitates the serialization of the query.
